author: jgallacher
msg: Fixed conn_log_cerror for apache < 2.0.55 (ie AP_MAGIC less than 20020903.10).
This function falls back to ap_log_error for earlier apache versions,
but was passing conn->server instead of conn->base_server as an argument.

author: henning
msg: Reorganize the Throwable wrapping a bit (shuffle it up into VelocityException).
Add Template Name, Line Number and Column Number recording to MethodInvocationException
by implementing the ExtendedParseException interface thus allowing Velocity integrators
to retrieve the location and the template exactly and in the same way as with the other

author: jkuhnert
msg: Fixed side effect bug from changes in locale management with dojo. (Need to explicitly require a localization bundle

msg: personal info + making war plugin explicit
